'''''Hygrocybe nigrescens''''', commonly known as the '''blackening wax-cap''', is a [[mushroom]] of the waxcap genus ''[[Hygrocybe]]''. It is found in Europe<ref name="rogersmushrooms">{{cite web|url=http://www.rogersmushrooms.com/gallery/DisplayBlock~bid~6150~source~gallerychooserresult.asp |title=Rogers Mushrooms - Hygrocybe nigrescens Mushroom |publisher=Rogersmushrooms.com |accessdate=2015-11-02 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160304052814/http://www.rogersmushrooms.com/gallery/DisplayBlock~bid~6150~source~gallerychooserresult.asp |archivedate=2016-03-04 }}</ref> and Africa.<ref name="whatspecies">{{cite web|url=http://whatspecies.com/blackening-wax-cap|title=Blackening Wax Cap - WhatSpecies|publisher=Whatspecies.com|accessdate=2015-11-02}}</ref>
